DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare Topography Guided Laser In Situ Keratomileusis ( LASIK ) corneal surgery Small Incision Lenticule Extraction ( SMILE ) corneal surgery treatment myopia astigmatism .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Topography Guided LASIK With WaveLightÂ® EX500 SMILE With Zeiss VisuMax
DOC.criteria: Able comprehend sign inform consent form ; Willing able complete postoperative visit ; Myopia require refractive error correction 0.5 8.0 D cylinder least 0.75 D corneal astigmatism ; Intended treatment target emmetropia ; Preoperative bestcorrected visual acuity ( BCVA ) 0 logarithm minimum angle refraction ( logMAR ) ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Pregnant lactating , current plan , course study ; Dry eye ; Corneal disease ; Diagnosis advance glaucoma ; Uncontrolled diabetes ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
